required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy of the Sterile Single-use Circular Stapling Device CIRCCURER II (Jiangxi Langhe Medical Instrument Co., Ltd., Guangzhou, China)
clinical_study.official_title: Evaluation of the Safety and Efficacy of the Sterile Single-use Circular Stapling Device CIRCCURER II (Jiangxi Langhe Medical Instrument Co., Ltd., Guangzhou, China) in Adult Patients Suffering From Pathologic Foreskin (Phimosis, Stenosis, Redundant Prepuce): A Prospective Randomised Comparative Clinical Trial

brief_summary.textblock: Evaluation of the safety and efficacy of the sterile single-use circular stapling device CIRCCURER II (Jiangxi Langhe Medical Instrument Co., Ltd., Guangzhou, China) in comparison with circumcision in adults patients with pathological foreskin (phimosis, stenosis, redundant prepuce)

primary_outcome.description: Measurement defined as follows: mild=1, moderate=2 and large=3, according to the surgeon's estimation
Measurement defined as follows: mild=1, moderate=2 and large=3, according to the surgeon's estimation
Measurement defined as follows: mild=1, moderate=2 and large=3, according to the surgeon's estimation

primary_outcome.time_frame: Intraoperative (Measurement begins at the time of the beginning of the sterilisation of the surgical field and ends at the time of the completion of the bandeage of the wound)

secondary_outcome.description: Measurement defined as follows: mild=1, moderate=2 and large=3, according to the surgeon's estimation
Measurement defined as follows: mild=1, moderate=2 and large=3, according to the surgeon's estimation
Visual analogue scale from 0 to 10, as follows: 0 - 5 = unsatisfactory, 6 - 7 = moderately satisfactory, 8 - 9 = very satisfactory, 10 = excellent, according to the patient's estimation

other_outcome.description: Visual analogue scale from 0 to 10, as follows: 0 = no pain, 1-3 = mild pain, 4-6 = moderate pain, 7-9 = very severe pain and 10 = worst possible pain, according to the patient's estimation
Quantity of applied lidocaine hydrochloride 2% w/v in milliliters

arm_group.description: Adult patients treated with sterile single-use circular stapling device CIRCCURERII (Jiangxi Langhe Medical Instrument Co., Ltd., Guangzhou, China)

intervention.intervention_name: Circumcision in adults using sterile single-use circular stapling device
intervention.description: Circumcision in adults using sterile single-use circular stapling device CIRCCURER II (Jiangxi Langhe Medical Instrument Co., Ltd., Guangzhou, China)

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion criteria :phimosis, stenosis of foreskin, redundant prepuce
Exclusion criteria : active inflammation of foreskin

eligibility.gender_description: Only males suffer from foreskin pathologic conditions

overall_official.affiliation: Urology Department, University of Thessaly, University Hospital of Larissa, Greece

facility.name: Urology Department, University of Thessaly, University Hospital of Larissa

patient_data.ipd_description: All IPD that underlie results in a publication
patient_data.ipd_time_frame: After a publication and for a period of 2 years
